# Inline Code Test

This fixture validates inline code rendering with backtick syntax.

---

## Basic Inline Code

This is regular text with `inline code` in the middle.

Multiple code snippets: `foo`, `bar`, `baz`.

---

## Special Characters

Code with HTML tags: `<html>`, `<div>`, `<span>`.

Code with quotes: `"double quotes"`, `'single quotes'`.

Code with symbols: `$variable`, `@decorator`, `#hash`.

---

## Position Tests

Code at start: `beginning` of line.

Code at end of line: `ending`.

Only code: `standalone`.

---

## Long Inline Code (Overflow Test)

This is a very long code span: `this_is_a_very_long_function_name_that_extends_beyond_the_visible_window_width_to_test_horizontal_scrolling_or_wrapping_behavior_with_inline_code_spans_in_the_markdown_viewer_application_when_rendering_extremely_long_identifiers_or_paths`.

Another test with path: `/usr/local/bin/some/very/long/filesystem/path/that/goes/on/and/on/and/might/wrap/or/scroll/depending/on/window/size/settings`.
